```{r}
Brent <- read_csv("C:\\Users\\ALEX\\Desktop\\test1\\separate_report\\csv\\Brent.csv")

# Clethodim_SURVIVAL_RATE
ggplot(Brent) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = Accession_Name, y = Clethodim_SURVIVAL_RATE, fill = Farmer_Agronomist), stat = "identity") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("grey80", "grey65", "grey50", "grey35", "red")) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size=7, angle=90))
```
